Characters.name: Oliver Spark
Characters.image_prompt: A portrait of an 11-year-old boy with mischievous eyes and a playful smile. He has brown hair and is wearing a red hoodie.

Characters.name: Mr. Puddlesworth
Characters.image_prompt: A portrait of a kind-looking, middle-aged man with a white chef's hat and a warm smile. He has a slightly chubby face and wears a white apron.

Characters.name: The Thief
Characters.image_prompt: A portrait of a shadowy figure with a menacing expression. He is wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Oliver was like any other kid his age—he loved playing video games, hated doing homework, and had a knack for getting into mischief.
Scenes.image_prompt: An 11-year-old boy sitting on the floor in a bedroom, playing video games. He is wearing a red hoodie and has a mischievous grin on his face. The room is messy, with video game controllers and empty pizza boxes scattered around.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: It all started on a boring Tuesday afternoon. Oliver was stuck at the local science museum on a school field trip.
Scenes.image_prompt: A group of schoolchildren walking through a science museum, looking at dinosaur exhibits. One boy, wearing a red hoodie, is lagging behind, looking bored and restless.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: While most of his classmates were busy learning about dinosaurs and planets, Oliver had slipped away from the group to explore the “Super Secret Science Lab” exhibit.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in a dimly lit laboratory, looking around in awe. There are strange machines, beakers filled with colorful liquids, and a sign that reads “Do Not Enter.”

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He tiptoed around, poking at beakers and pressing buttons, when suddenly he came across a strange-looking drink in a flask labeled “Do Not Drink.”
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, peering into a flask filled with a glowing blue liquid. He is looking curious and intrigued. The flask is labeled with the words “Do Not Drink.”

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Without thinking twice, he took a big gulp.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, taking a large gulp from a flask filled with a glowing blue liquid. His eyes are wide with surprise and his face is contorted in a grimace.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: As soon as the liquid hit his tongue, Oliver felt a tingling sensation run through his body.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in a laboratory, with his eyes closed and his body contorting as a tingling sensation runs through him. He is surrounded by strange machines and beakers.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: His hair stood on end, his toes tingled, and his eyes flashed bright blue. Then, as quickly as it started, everything went back to normal.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in a laboratory, looking bewildered. His hair is standing on end, his eyes are flashing blue, and his toes are twitching.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: The next morning, as Oliver was getting ready for school, he reached for his favorite red hoodie hanging on the top shelf of his closet. But instead of jumping up to grab it, his hand stretched. And stretched. And stretched!
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a closet, his arm stretching out towards a red hoodie hanging on the top shelf. His eyes are wide with surprise and his mouth is open in shock.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Oliver’s arm was suddenly ten feet long!
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a closet, his arm stretched out to an enormous length, reaching the top shelf. He is looking amazed and confused.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He grabbed the hoodie, and his arm snapped back to its normal length.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a closet, holding his red hoodie in his hand. His arm is back to its normal length. He is looking at his hand in disbelief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Throughout the day, Oliver discovered more strange things happening to him. In gym class, he accidentally lifted the entire soccer goal while trying to kick the ball.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in a gym class, lifting a soccer goal with one hand. He is looking surprised and slightly embarrassed. Other students are watching in amazement.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: At lunch, he sneezed and a small burst of fire came out of his nose, slightly toasting his peanut butter sandwich.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, sitting at a lunch table, sneezing. A small burst of fire shoots out of his nose, slightly scorching his peanut butter sandwich. His classmates are looking at him in shock and amusement.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: And during math class, he found that he could read his teacher’s mind (which mostly consisted of thoughts about cats and lasagna).
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, sitting at a desk in a classroom, with his eyes closed and a confused expression on his face. His teacher is standing at the front of the class, writing on the blackboard. The boy is seemingly able to hear his teacher's thoughts, which are about cats and lasagna.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Oliver quickly realized that the strange drink he had at the museum must have given him superpowers!
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, sitting on his bed in his bedroom, looking at his reflection in the mirror. His eyes are wide with excitement and his face is filled with wonder. He is holding a glass of water in his hand, looking at it with suspicion.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Excited and slightly terrified, he decided to test them out.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, looking around with a determined expression. His eyes are filled with excitement and a hint of fear. He is holding a glass of water in his hand, ready to experiment.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: After school, he raced home, locked himself in his room, and began experimenting.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, sitting in his bedroom, experimenting with his new powers. He is trying to stretch his arms, turn invisible, and fly. He is looking confused and slightly frustrated.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He discovered that he could stretch like a rubber band, turn invisible (though he always left his shoes behind), and even fly—but only three feet off the ground.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, trying to stretch his arm like a rubber band. He is looking excited and surprised by his newfound ability. In the background, his shoes are lying on the floor, as he is attempting to turn invisible.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: But his powers were unpredictable.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, looking confused and frustrated as his powers change unpredictably. He is trying to stretch his arm, but instead, it turns into a plant. He is looking at his hand in disbelief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: One minute he’d have super speed, and the next, he’d accidentally turn into a small potted plant.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, looking surprised and slightly scared. He is trying to run fast, but instead, he turns into a small potted plant. He is looking at his reflection in the mirror in disbelief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Despite the chaotic nature of his new abilities, Oliver was thrilled.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, smiling brightly. He is looking at his reflection in the mirror and is excited by his new powers. He is trying to stretch his arm like a rubber band and is having fun with it.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He started calling himself “The Amazing Oliver,” dreaming of all the heroic deeds he could accomplish.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, holding his hands on his hips and looking determined. He is smiling confidently and is daydreaming about all the heroic deeds he could accomplish with his new powers.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: But being a superhero wasn’t as easy as he thought.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, looking frustrated and defeated. He is holding a glass of water in his hand and trying to turn it into something else, but nothing is happening. He is looking at his hand with disappointment.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: One evening, Oliver heard a loud crash from Mr. Puddlesworth’s bakery across the street.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, looking out his window at a bakery across the street. He is looking worried and concerned, as he hears a loud crash coming from the bakery.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He saw a shadowy figure sneaking out with a bag full of stolen pastries.
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure sneaking out of a bakery, holding a bag full of pastries. He is wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask. He is looking around cautiously, making sure no one is watching.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: This was his chance to be a hero!
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in his bedroom, looking determined and excited. He is clenching his fists and is ready to go out and stop the thief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Oliver ran outside, ready to confront the thief.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, running out of his house, determined to stop the thief. He is looking determined and focused, ready to confront the evildoer.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “Stop right there, evildoer!” Oliver shouted, striking what he hoped was a heroic pose.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a bakery, shouting at a shadowy figure. He is striking a heroic pose, with his arms outstretched and his face full of determination. The thief is looking at him with amusement and disbelief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: The thief turned around, clearly unimpressed.
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, turning around to face a young boy, wearing a red hoodie. He is looking at the boy with amusement and disdain. He is holding a bag full of pastries in his hand.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “What are you supposed to be? A circus act?”
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, standing in front of a bakery, looking at a young boy, wearing a red hoodie, with a mocking expression. He is holding a bag full of pastries in his hand. The boy is looking frustrated and embarrassed.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Oliver puffed out his chest.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a bakery, trying to look brave and confident. He is puffing out his chest and trying to stand tall, but he is still looking slightly scared. The thief is looking at him with amusement.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “I’m The Amazing Oliver! And I’m here to stop you!”
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a bakery, looking at a shadowy figure with a determined expression. He is holding his hands on his hips and is trying to sound confident. The thief is looking at him with amusement and disbelief.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He tried to stretch his arms to grab the thief, but instead, he turned into a squirrel.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, trying to stretch his arms to grab a shadowy figure, but instead, he turns into a squirrel. He is looking confused and frustrated as his powers work unpredictably.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: The thief burst out laughing.
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, standing in front of a bakery, laughing hysterically at a young boy who has turned into a squirrel. He is holding a bag full of pastries in his hand. The boy is looking embarrassed and frustrated.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “Oh, this is too good,” the thief chuckled.
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, standing in front of a bakery, chuckling at a young boy who has turned into a squirrel. He is looking amused and entertained. The boy is looking embarrassed and frustrated.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “A superhero squirrel. I’ll give you a head start, little guy.”
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, standing in front of a bakery, looking down at a squirrel with a mocking expression. He is holding a bag full of pastries in his hand. The squirrel is looking up at the thief with a determined expression.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Frustrated, Oliver tried to transform back, but his powers were stuck.
Scenes.image_prompt: A squirrel running across the sidewalk, looking determined and frustrated. It is trying to transform back into a human, but its powers are not working. The squirrel is looking around frantically, hoping to find a way to revert back to its human form.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: He chased the thief in his squirrel form, scurrying up walls and leaping across rooftops.
Scenes.image_prompt: A squirrel chasing a shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, through the streets. The squirrel is running up walls and leaping across rooftops, trying to catch the thief. The thief is looking back over his shoulder, laughing at the squirrel.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Finally, he managed to jump onto the thief’s shoulder and chomped down on his ear.
Scenes.image_prompt: A squirrel standing on a thief's shoulder, chomping down on his ear. The thief is looking back in surprise and pain. The squirrel is looking determined and victorious.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “Ouch! You crazy squirrel!” the thief yelped, dropping the bag of pastries.
Scenes.image_prompt: A shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask, standing on the sidewalk, looking back at a squirrel standing on his shoulder. He is yelping in pain and dropping the bag of pastries. The squirrel is looking back at him with a mischievous grin.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: The commotion caught the attention of Mr. Puddlesworth, who ran out and grabbed the thief.
Scenes.image_prompt: A man, wearing a white chef's hat and a white apron, running out of a bakery and grabbing a shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask. The thief is looking surprised and scared. The man is looking angry and determined.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: “Caught you red-handed!” he said triumphantly.
Scenes.image_prompt: A man, wearing a white chef's hat and a white apron, standing in front of a bakery, holding a shadowy figure, wearing a black hoodie and a ski mask. The thief is looking scared and defeated. The man is looking triumphant and proud.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: After the police arrived and took the thief away, Oliver finally managed to turn back into his human form.
Scenes.image_prompt: A young boy, wearing a red hoodie, standing in front of a bakery, looking relieved and happy. He is holding a bag of pastries in his hand and is smiling at the man, wearing a white chef's hat and a white apron. The police car is driving away in the background.

Scenes.name: Oliver
Scenes.story_text: Mr. Puddlesworth was so grateful, he gave Oliver a lifetime supply of chocolate éclairs.
